channel.title: Jendi Reiter on
channel.description: Recent content in Jendi Reiter on

item.title: Origin Story
item.description: If I had to comp this title, it’s like when I discovered Matt Dean, a talented writer self-publishing better litfic than 80% of the market, yet in a way that would earn rejections from most if not all of the big 5 and their imprints, as it’s not easily marketable as one thing or another.
